title: When you start sucking with a champion you're usually good with
body: It was a text bug I'd assume, but there's always the possibility that the game was taking a jab at me

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lapis,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tVuXzlWs,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-29T00:21:08.205+0000)
>
> It was a text bug I&#039;d assume, but there&#039;s always the possibility that the game was taking a jab at me

I wish that was not a bug. Would be so funny to see the faces of people who think "OHH GOD NO PLEASE!!!"

You think it was a bug.

Everyone knows it wasn't though

  : ^)
